name: Woander
description:
This is a platformer in development, you can find all the gameplay elements in this level.

Graphics aren't finished, and level design is to be made.

Controls :

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Down + space to slide

Jump + down for a rodeo attack

Shift to run

You can push the blocks on the floor  or break it with a rodeo attack

You can break the block in the air by jumping like Mario

Have fun !
